8.6.16  8:20 pm   I've written hundreds of song fragments in midi format over the years but instead of finishing them I just keep writing more. Once I get stuck I'll write a new song only to get stuck again. Most of them are like 5 to 30 seconds with the longer ones around 2 to 3 minutes. It's been several years and I only have a few finished songs released. Is there a way to break out of this habit and actually finish the older songs?
